attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: This app is so trash!!! Nothing seems to be working, I don’t see it changing to a better president!! Immediately deleted. Everyone says how he’s a good president but I honestly just don’t see it. It’s not even about Republicans V.S Democrats anymore, it’s just about Trump. Honestly, I don’t even mind the Republicans. If you support it then it’s perfectly fine, but supporting trump is the bigger issue. :/

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I got this app to recieve trump news for the 2020 election but in reality i just got GARBAGE. After i downloaded this app i started getting weird texts and emails and i realized it was from putting my phone number in this app!! It stole all my information and used my credit card to buy robux. This is a disgusting use of an app designed simply for our presidential news.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app is EXTREMELY GLITCHY and messed with my ENTIRE PHONE. I really did try to support trump with the app but the app made it SO HARD. I LOVE TRUMP SO MUCH but this app made me second guess him. My phone started to freeze and log out of apps by itself!!!!! It was crazy! If I could give 0 stars I would! Trump I love you but this app is horrible!!!! AND I’m an Anti-Vaxxer and RIGHT AFTER I DOWNLOADED THE APP MY BABY GOT CORONA. IT IS NOT A COINCIDENCE. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE APP IT IS HORRIBLE AND CAUSES DISEASE!!! 😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: Trump is so problematic 😾🤮
attributes.review: first off banning tiktok bc u dont like our generation bc we are better than u how abt u drop out bc we dont like u either. and who even names something a trump ralley . i feel bad for the ppl who support u, ur wife and ur son, also i hope u see this bc i need u to take some serious advice and get a better haircut its ugly and i dont like neither does any one else. also #BLACKLIVESMATTER ❤️

attributes.title: DONT GET
attributes.review: So I got this app, wish I didn’t. It gave my phone bugs and viruses. Like come on Trump the least you could do while hiding in that bucker is make an app that actually works. I’m very disappointed mister. Wish it was better. But sadly I don’t think you could make anything better so oh well. Don’t get this trash app people believe it’s not worth your time.🤢

attributes.title: WORST APP IVE EVER DOWNLOADED
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever used. It hacked all my personal info and keeps making pop ups of Donald trumps face on every website I go on now. MyRingtone is his voice! Why would an app developer do this??? It is taking over my entire phone and now I can’t stop saying Trump slogans to strangers. I did not sign up for this I will not be voting for Trump whatsoever him and his campaign are snot monkeys.

attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♂️✨So bad✨🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.review: This app is so glitched out. For some reason it’s been showing me photos of this moldy orange looking thing, and I was so disturbed I had to get off the app and puke. It made me fail all my classes, I got evicted out of my apartment, it made me break out, and my dog died. So, wouldn’t recommend. There’s a bug or something in it, and it needs help. You know what I mean. It really needs help.

attributes.title: Vanessa Guillen ❤️
attributes.review:
Vanessa Guillén was a 20-year-old U.S. Army soldier who authorities believe was killed on April 22, 2020, inside a Fort Hood, Texas, armory by another enlisted soldier, Aaron David Robinson, age 20. (Vanessa Guillén era una soldado del ejército estadounidense de 20 años que las autoridades creen que fue asesinada el 22 de abril de 2020, dentro de un arsenal de Fort Hood, Texas, por otro soldado alistado, Aaron David Robinson, de 20 años.) 
TRUMP NEVER SAID ANYTHING ABOUT HER❤️HE ONLY CARES ABOUT HIS PEOPLE 
NO HUMAN IS ILLEGAL ON STOLEN LAND THAT WAS STOLEN BY NATIVES, BUILT BY SLAVES AND KEPT BEAUTIFUL BY LATINOS🇸🇻(TRUMP NUNCA DIJO NADA SOBRE ELLA❤️ÉL SOLO SE IMPORTA SOBRE SU GENTE NINGÚN HUMANO ES ILEGAL EN TIERRAS ROBADAS QUE FUERON ROBADAS POR NATIVOS, CONSTRUIDAS POR ESCLAVOS Y GUARDADAS HERMOSAS POR LATINOS🇸🇻)

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: this app is quite possibly the worst thing to happen to humanity. my pet caterpillar got scared and died right on the spot and let me tell you I have had that caterpillar for 40,000 years and now it dies?!?! the information is horrible and wrong and the app is glitchy and I can not tell you one good thing about this app!!!! Do not get this, not worth it at all!!!!!!!

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I am so terrified I would leave not even one star if I could I open the app up and there was the most horrifying picture I’ve ever seen in my entire life it was like my life had flashed right in front of me I thought I was going to die right then and right there Donald Trump with his shirt off in his wig flying in the air and it was a video of him taping a hotdog to his pants and throwing it back
